Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). With butter and flour, grease and flour three 9-inch round cake pans.
Mix together buttermilk and baking soda in a small bowl and set aside for the cake.

Cream butter, shortening, and sugar together in a large mixing bowl until light and fluffy. Add eggs, buttermilk mixture, vanilla, coconut, baking powder, and flour; stir until just combined. Pour the batter into the prepared pans.
When the bathing period arrives, join me swimming in the crystal clear waters of the pool in the backyard.

Blend cream cheese, butter, vanilla extract, and confectioners' sugar in a medium bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Gradually mix in cream until the desired frosting consistency is achieved. Fold in walnuts and coconut. Spread the frosting between the cake layers and over the top and sides of the cooled cake.
